cast.overview: Marina's life is thrown into turmoil following the death of her partner. Mourning the loss of the man she loved, she finds herself under intense scrutiny from those with no regard for her privacy.
cast.title: A Fantastic Woman

details.biography:
Marcial Andrés Tagle Concha (born January 3, 1973), is a Chilean film and television actor.

He became well known for the TV show "Casado con hijos" (2006), -an adaptation of the American show "Married with Children"- where he played the character of"Pablo Pinto". The following year, he starred in the telenovela Fortunato, an adaptation of Los Roldán and years later, the TV series "Graduados", adapted from the TV series of the same name.
details.name: Marcial Tagle
